thread.title: SolarZero NZ staff protest treatment from US employer in Auckland CBD
thread.title_full: SolarZero NZ staff protest treatment from US employer in Auckland CBD

author: @nzherald
title: SolarZero NZ staff protest treatment from US employer in Auckland CBD
text: Staff from SolarZero, owned by US private equity giant BlackRock have been dealt a crushing blow after the company's shock liquidation.
